00013 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SILENCE__
00014 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_SILENCE__
00015 
00016 #include <wx/defs.h>
00017 #include <wx/dialog.h>
00018 #include <wx/intl.h>
00019 
00020 #include "Generator.h"
00021 #include "../widgets/TimeTextCtrl.h"
00022 
00023 class wxSizer;
00024 class wxTextCtrl;
00025 
00026 class EffectSilence : public Generator {
00027 
00028  public:
00029    EffectSilence() {
00030       SetEffectFlags(BUILTIN_EFFECT | INSERT_EFFECT);
00031    }
00032 
00033    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00034       return wxString(_("Silence..."));
00035    }
00036 
00037    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00038       std::set<wxString> result;
00039       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#GeneratorPlugin"));
00040       return result;
00041    }
00042 
00043    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00044       return wxString(wxT("Silence"));
00045    }
00046 
00047    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00048       return wxString(_("Generating Silence"));
00049    }
00050 
00051    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00052    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription() { 
00053       return wxString::Format(_("Applied effect: Generate Silence, %.6lf seconds"), mDuration); 
00054    } 
00055 
00056    virtual bool PromptUser();
00057  protected:
00058    bool GenerateTrack(WaveTrack *tmp, const WaveTrack &track, int ntrack);
00059 };
00060 
00061 #endif
